L7p:Comment.stringValue: ** Parse the payload if ${config.parsed} is true

L7p:value.stringValue: // Cast the payload to a message type
// Not an empty string, or empty and the data type is VARCHAR2 or CLOB
Convert date fields to Date context variables
// Consummer passed an empty value for a NUMBER
// If it is empty and is a number send a NULL
If parameter is a Date parameter, then convert default to a Date context variable
// If there is a default use it
Parameter was not in request and does not have a default. Return error
// Either 1) Empty arg and not a string 2) not existing arg
